caption.p: Search parameters for the ten maneuvers analyzed in the study. The definitions, units, and symbols for the 14 related performance metrics are also provided.

tr.td: Start: velocity xyz minimumEnd: velocity xyz maximumDistance xyz > 25 cm
Start: velocity xy minimumEnd: velocity xy maximumDistance xy > 25 cmDistance z < 10 cm
Start: velocity xy maximumEnd: velocity xy minimumDistance xy > 25 cmDistance z < 10 cm
Start: velocity z minimumEnd: velocity z maximumDistance z > 25 cm
Start: velocity z maximumEnd: velocity z minimumDistance z > 25 cm
Start: pitch minimumEnd: pitch maximumDegrees rotated > 45 degDistance xyz < 10 cm
Start: pitch maximumEnd: pitch minimumDegrees rotated > 45 degDistance xyz < 10 cm
Start: velocity yaw = 0 deg/sEnd: velocity yaw = 0 deg/sDegrees rotated > 90 degPitch maximum < 75 degDistance xyz < 10 cm
Start: Δ heading velocity > 0.25 rev/sEnd Δ heading velocity < 0.25 rev/sVelocity xy min > 50 cm/sDistance xy > 25 cmDistance z < 10 cm
Start: velocity maximumEnd: velocity maximumPitch maximum > 75 degDistance xy before velocityMin > 12.5 cmDistance xy after velocity Min < 12.5 cmDistance z < 10 cm

fn.p: *for a 25 cm segment centered at the sharpest point of the turn
†for a 25 cm segment centered at the minimum velocity xyz
